newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-ATLETICO GAME SUSPENDED BECAUSE OF STOMACH BUG.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ATLETICO GAME SUSPENDED BECAUSE OF STOMACH BUG.

text.p: The Spanish Football Federation has agreed to suspend Atletico Madrid's league game at Tenerife later on Sunday after a bout of gastro-enteritis left the champions without 10 players from the first team squad.
No date has been fixed for the replay. A similar decision after Real Betis were hit by a 'flu bug three weeks ago was heavily criticised by club chairmen and coaches.
